text: Hagi rama'a knama evutenige'na henkama esia kafufina hugantane'na vunka, hapinti'ma kumazmi'ma eri haviza hazage'za ru mopafima umani emanima hu'nazaregati'ma ete e'za kumazmi'ma emeri so'ema hu'za Israeli mopafima me'nea agonaramimpima mani fru'ma hu'za knare'ma hu'za mani'naza vahe'ene hara eme huzmantegahane.
